snippet: America needs to train dental therapists who can provide preventive care and perform routine procedures outside traditional dentists’ offices.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Dr Louis W Sullivan draws attention to the fact that many Americans are not getting preventive dental care, resulting in unnecessary emergency room visits and, in some cases, death; attributes this lack of care to a shortage of dentists, particularly in rural and poor areas; contends that an immediate solution is the training of dental therapists, which are common in many other countries.
lead_paragraph: America needs to train dental therapists who can provide preventive care and perform routine procedures outside traditional dentists’ offices.
